issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
The telephone number isn't a link on iPhone.

This is not a regression it occurs on SDK 2.1.0.GA

Steps to reproduce:
1) Launch refactored Kitchen Sink (Kevin Winnerey/Developer relations version) > Base UI > Views > Web Views
2) â€¨Tap on 'Local URL'.

Actual result:
The telephone number isn't a link.

Expected result:
The telephone number should be a link.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Base UI > Views > Web Views > Local URL: on iPhone the telephone number isn't a link
fields.environment:
iPhone4 (5.1), iPhone4s (5.1)
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.1.201207271312
SDK version: 2.1.0.GA and 2.1.1.v20120727140110

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
